content:
please I can't bear to expand 175 comments again :laughing:

I want to find the comment that matches typeck::check_crate on https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/73566. typeck::check_crate is:pr author:jyn514 is:closed brings up the PR itself but not the comment that matches.
I found https://developer.github.com/v4/explorer/ which gives me something close

this gives me the first 100 comments at least 

{
  repository(name: "rust", owner: "rust-lang") {
    pullRequest(number: 73566) {
      comments(first: 100) {
        nodes {
          body
          id
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
I just ended up expanding them all in the web ui
